                      Dim dimension)
        Returns null, as doubleBoxes are not of uniform size.
        Specified by:
        getBoxSize in class BoxManager
        Parameters:
        box - the 0-based index of the box in the collection.
        dimension - the size of the overall array of boxes, in pixels
        Returns:
        the size of the box requested scaled to the specified full-screen dimension.
